original_text: And if it be not redeemed within the space of a full year, then the house that is in the walled city shall be established for ever to him that bought it throughout his generations: it shall not go out in the jubile.
korean_text: 일 년 안에 무르지 못하면 그 성 안의 가옥은 산 자의 소유로 확정되어 대대로 영구히 그에게 속하고 희년에라도 돌려보내지 아니할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And if it be not redeemed
within the space of a full year
then the house that is in the walled city
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 성벽이 있는 도시 안에 있는 집은

sentences.original_text: to him that bought it throughout his generations
it shall not go out in the jubile
